ValidationRule.description: Renewal date locked. 07/05/2021 Deprecated upon request by Mandy.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(ISNEW()), Allow_End_Date_Update__c = False,
OR( AND(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Existing Business-Upsell"), ISCHANGED(End_date_contract__c)), AND( OR( ISCHANGED(End_date_contract__c), ISCHANGED(Startdate_contract__c)), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Existing Business-Renewal"))), NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"), NOT( OR(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"), $Permission.Edit_Upsell_Renewal_End_date) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Renewal dates and upsell end dates are locked. Please contact Mandy for changes.
